title: Looking to join a Silver Flex Team (Currently Unranked in Flex)
body: Hey Oceania, I'm a JG main looking to join a flex team who voice chat (I'm 16). Silver 3 before placements in S8, this is my first true season and I'd love to join a team. Good at champs like {{champion:113}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:5}}. Add me [Novissimis] or on discord at Novissimis#2064. Thanks!
